interface.name: qt_example_extension
interface.description: This example shows how to add extra functionality to Wayland through an extension. This is the global object of the extension.

request.name: register_surface

description.summary: Register a surface with the example extension

request.description: Inform the compositor that the client has a new surface that is covered by the extension.

request.name: bounce

description.summary: Move the surface around for a little while

request.description: The compositor should perform a move animation on the surface.

request.name: spin

description.summary: Rotate the surface for a little while

request.description: The compositor should perform a rotating animation on the surface.

event.name: close
event.description: Ask the client to close the window for the surface.

event.name: set_font_size
event.description: Ask the client to change the font size on the surface.

enum.name: decoration_state
enum.description: Describes whether window decorations should be shown.

event.name: set_window_decoration
event.description: Ask the client to turn window decoration on/off on all surfaces.

request.name: create_local_object
request.description: Create a new object that should be visualized by the compositor

interface.name: qt_example_local_object

description.summary: An object created on the client side

interface.description: This object should have a visual representation in the compositor.

request.name: set_text
request.description: Tell the compositor that the object's text is changed

event.name: clicked
event.description: Notification to the client that the user clicked the representation of the object in the compositor.
